name: Tripped
desc: You are knocked prone

name: Bruised Ego
desc: You can attack no other target for 1d4 rounds (or until the target is dead)]

name: Awkward Attack
desc: You take a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds

name: Tiring Attack
desc: You are fatigued

name: Upset Tummy
desc: You are sickened for 1d4 rounds

name: I Bit My Tug
desc: You take 1 point of bleed

name: Muscle Tear
desc: You take 1d4 points of Str damage

name: Stinging Failure
desc: You take 1d6 points of nonlethal damage and a -2 penalty on attack rolls with that attack for 1d4 rounds

name: Smash the Floor
desc: You kick up dust that blinds you for 1d4 rounds (Fort negates)

name: He's Sharp
desc: You take 1d6 points of damage & your Str modifier

name: Torn Muscle
desc: You take 1 point of Str drain (Fort negates)

name: Got Too Close
desc: Your attack hits the target but the target may start a grapple against you for free

name: Off Balance
desc: You can only take a move action next round

name: He Bit Your Fist
desc: The target deals bite damage to you

name: Fist Meets Face
desc: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit

name: Out of Position
desc: You cannot use this attack for 1 round

name: Wide Open
desc: You are flat-footed for 1 round

name: Bleeding Fist
desc: You take 1d6 points of bleed

name: Twisted
desc: You become entangled in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself

name: Stop Hitting Yourself
desc: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target

name: Just a Taste
desc: Your attack hits an ally adjacent to you or the target

name: Overextend
desc: You provoke an attack of opportunity from all adjacent opponents

name: Frustration
desc: You take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 round

name: Broken Tooth
desc: You take a -2 penalty on attack rolls for 1d6 minutes

name: Not the Weak Point
desc: Your enemy's armor takes 1d6 points of damage. You take 1d6 points of damage and cannot use that attack for 1d3 rounds

name: That Tastes Awful!
desc: If this was a bite attack, you are nauseated for 1d6 rounds

name: Broke a Nail
desc: You take 1d4 points of damage and you cannot use this attack until healed

name: Sprain
desc: You take 1d4 points of Dex damage

name: Overexertion
desc: You are exhausted (Fort Negates)

name: Don't Pick At It
desc: You take 1 point of Con damage

name: We have a Wiener
desc: You fall unconscious for 1d6 round (Will Negates)

name: Whiff
desc: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target

name: Jam a Finger
desc: Your target takes normal damage, you take double damage

name: Caught Your Attack
desc: The target may attempt to trip, bull rush or overrun you (target's choice)

name: Pins & Needles
desc: You are sickened for 1d6 rounds

name: Great Roar
desc: You are deafened until healed (DC 15 Heal Check)

name: Head, Meet Wall
desc: You are dazed for 1d3 rounds

name: Ferocious Fumble
desc: Your attack hits an ally within reach and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit

name: Sneeze!
desc: You are dazed for 1 round

name: Ingrown Nail
desc: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit

name: Whirlwind of Shame
desc: Your attack deals damage to all targets adjacent to you except the original target

name: Battered
desc: You take a -2 penalty on skill checks and saves for 1d4 hours

name: Winds of Change
desc: You threaten no squares for 1d6 rounds

name: Unintentional Move
desc: Move 10 feet in a random direction and provoke attacks of opportunity as normal

name: Eye Strain
desc: You are blinded for 1 round

name: Hangnail
desc: If this was a claw attack, slam or unarmed strike, you cannot use that attack for 1d6 rounds

name: Brutal Collision
desc: Your attack hits, but you are stunned for 2 rounds (For save reduces the stun to 1 round)

name: Pinched Nerve
desc: If you had reach greater than 5 feet, it is reduced to 5 feet for 3 rounds

name: Overthink It
desc: Your target's armor and natural armor bonuses are doubled against you for 3 rounds

name: Punctured Foot
desc: You take 1d3 points of damage and your speed is halved until healed

name: Bone Bruise
desc: You take 1d2 point of Con damage

name: Bad Headbutt
desc: You are stunned for 1 round (Fort negates)
